name: Jumpy Bird (TheMistMakesGames)
description:
This game was created just for fun, and with only 12 hours. The game is really easy, obviously the physic isn't the same of the original game. 

How to play:

  1. Click with left mouse to jump.
  2. Avoid the obstacles and reach your best record.

Everything about the original game belongs to the real developers of the real Flappy Bird.
